title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 1205/97 of 27 June 1997 fixing the weighting coefficients to be used in calculating the Community market price for pig carcases and repealing Regulation (EC) No 1175/96
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 1205/97 of 27 June 1997 fixing the weighting coefficients to be used in calculating the Community market price for pig carcases and repealing Regulation (EC) No 1175/96
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The weighting coefficients referred to in Article 4 (2) of Regulation (EEC) No 2759/75 shall be as specified in the Annex hereto.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
It shall apply from 1 July 1997.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 27 June 1997.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
